website_summaries.verdict: A versatile model that can roast turkeys but also make baked goods.
pros: An inexpensive option that has many different uses, such as roast, slow cook, or bake
cons: The downside of the attractive red finish is that it may chip off over time

customer_reviews.title: It cooks evenly and it easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This thing is FABULOUS. Authentic bbq flavor. It cooks evenly and it is easy to clean. I am including pictures of bbq chicken wings I did over the weekend. I'm not really good at reviews but I will answer questions.
customer_reviews.author: Memphis Slim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for apartments or people who don't want a big greasy smoker
customer_reviews.text: I use it for prime rib, baby back ribs... All kinds of stuff. I have been so happy with it I have recommended it to family for holiday cooking. The little smoker pockets work well and it keeps meat moist. It cleans up well enough that I can put it in the closet when I am done so much more convenient than a full size. I was going to get a traeger or similar but they burn a ton of chips (pellets) and require a certain type. I can put any chip I want in this and chips will go much further.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME for Great Smoking and Tender Meat
customer_reviews.text: Love at first try! So very much easier than babysitting a smoker all day. We have done ribs, pork butt, whole chickens, wings, and turkey breast. All had fantastic smoke and great tenderness. The only thing I don't like is cleaning it BUT the food is so worth the cleaning effort. I soak the removable pan, smoker chip cups and lid in a big laundry sink with lots of Dawn and hot water over night and use a Mr Clean Magic eraser the next day. You can seriously beat the beat BBQ you can buy and afford to have it more often. YUM!
customer_reviews.author: BB (Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Not a good roaster. Okay smoker.
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a roaster with an option to smoke, don't get this. We had to spend an extra $20 to get a regular insert from the Oster site because the holes in the original pan cause leaking. Smoked with it once, but the smoke residue doesn't come off so I felt bad about returning it. And I thought the complaints about cord length were silly, but it's really, really short. We're not exaggerating. I wish I would have gotten a high capacity regular roaster and left this to the smoking enthusiasts.
customer_reviews.author: MChristine

customer_reviews.title: Easy Way to Smoke
customer_reviews.text: This is so much easier than a charcoal smoker and more space efficient than large electric smokers. I've now done smoked pork butt, chickens, and chicken wings. All have turned out delicious. You'll have to experiment a bit with your cook times, temperatures, etc. but that is part of the fun. I've noted some small tweaks I can make for future recipes but even my initial "failures" tasted great. As others have noted, the cord is short. I only use this thing outside to smoke (have never used the roaster function) and use an outdoor extension cord. I use a long extension cord despite the manufacturer recommendation to use a short extension cord but haven't had any issues. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea
customer_reviews.text: It works great! Really gives a lot of smoke. I really like the convenience of it. Just take it outside, put it on a patio table, add your chips, and plug in. Total time, 3 minutes. The only reason that I gave it a 4 star is even though I have had it for only 1month, used it twice, washed and dried it thoroughly before putting it away, I am already noticing signs of rust trying to develop. As much as I love the product, I have to resolve that in a year or so, I will be buying another one. I can see that this one is not going last long.
customer_reviews.author: That one lady

customer_reviews.title: Sharp edges!
customer_reviews.text: I made the best turkey ever. No basting, no opening & closing oven. I still stuff my bird, but I stick the meat thermometer into the stuffing, Not the thigh. Just one thing keeps me from giving 5 stars... the very sharp edges under the lip of the insert. Only small areas at the long ends are rounded under. My fingers slipped when lifting it and tore a chunk of flesh out of one of them. Its easy to slice yourself when trying to wash it, too.
customer_reviews.author: Jean McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Meats definitely receive a good smoke flavor at higher temps
customer_reviews.text: For the price and ease this item does amazingly well. Highly advise you to use a thermometer for not only temping the meat but also for gauging the cooking temp. Smoking is significantly reduced at lower temps due to design of the wood trays and how they are heated from the sides of the cooker. Meats definitely receive a good smoke flavor at higher temps, but cook a bit faster than I would like and can be tougher due to extra heat. Suggest starting at a high temp to get the wood smoking then reduce temp for longer cooks to loosen meat up.
customer_reviews.author: Bret K.

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: This smoker worked well for my small turkey. It has a nice smokey flavor, golden brown skin, and it didn't dry the meat out. Everything was still very juicy. I do have a few suggestions when using this smoker; change your wood chips out at the half way point. They will burn and give your food a burnt tast Keep your meat away from the side walls and dont over stuff the smoker. I used a small turkey and it worked great. Also you might want check the temperature. I feel like it's a lot hotter then the temperature setting states.
customer_reviews.author: LDouglas

customer_reviews.title: Great roaster!
customer_reviews.text: I love this roaster. I use it outside in the garage so I don’t have to heat up the whole kitchen with the stove. I use a cast iron skillet and it browns nicely when I make my Keto yeast rolls. I smoked a chicken and it came out good but you cant smoke on too high a setting. The hickory chips will burn up too quickly and give the meat a more charred smoky taste. Very handy and nice roaster.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky D.

customer_reviews.title: Love the smoker
customer_reviews.text: We have been wanting a smoker but just weren't ready to make the commitment. This little smoker was the right price to try and boy are we happy! We took it out of the box and it looked good for a refurbished item and we enjoyed the discount. The first thing we tried was a whole chicken with some Apple wood! Now understand we are smoking newbies, the chicken was the best we'd every tasted! It was amazing. Day 2 we cooked some ribs, also excellent! Tomorrow we are trying some burgers. We have a new hobby! We couldn't be happier with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: peterfamily

customer_reviews.title: Works well, made a yummy turkey
customer_reviews.text: Love it! The temperature does run about 80 degrees high in the low 200 range but that's easy enough to dial in and mark using a digital thermometer. I used Weber chips, apple and pecan on a 15 pound turkey, and they worked well. Directions specifically say not to use chunks. Clean up was easy, let it soak overnight. I did use butter in the bird so that may have coated the bottom and prevented too much hardened stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This roaster is great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a smoker that rusted out. Didn't have really high hopes that it would do very good. This thing is great. Infuses lots of smoke flavoring into the meat without using near as much wood. Have cooked a turkey, pork chops and ribs in it so far. I think a chicken is next.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff kruse

customer_reviews.title: I just purchased this item planning for it to be ...
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this item planning for it to be a replacement for a roaster and crockpot with the bonus of the smoker. Unfortunately right out the gate my biggest issue is the short cord. I can't even plug it in on my standard kitchen counter without an extension cord, which I believe completely negates the whole reason they put a short cord on it to begin with. If a cord can't reach from the appliance to the kitchen counter outlet there is a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you have a heat proof table and out door extension cord
customer_reviews.text: This roaster is big. However, it states you must have the pan in the roaster and not to cook directly in the basin. I had a 6 lb chicken and it filled the rack. Not exactly sure how a 20 lb turkey will fit, or two racks of ribs for that matter. We are big family so I was hoping it would hold what it said. Overall temp, you just need to make sure you have thermometer to check your meat temps. And like others said, the cord is EXTREMELY short and it’s not an inside cooking unit. I can’t say I’m completely displeased, but I can say I probably won’t be using it much.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Russell

customer_reviews.title: Smoker is easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: My first attempt using this smoker/roaster was salmon filets smoked with hickory chips. I started the temperature at about 325 for just a few minutes to get the wood smoking a little ... then lowered temp to about 225. I used about 1/2 cup water and smoked about 1 1/2 hours. Delicious! (Note: I sprayed the inside of the lid, roasting pan, and rack with Grilling Pam before I put the food in ... it definitely made clean up super easy.)
customer_reviews.author: NancyG

customer_reviews.title: So easy it was scary.
customer_reviews.text: I was really amazed at how easy it was and the amazing flavor of my first smoked turkey and everything since then. Plug it in, turn it on, add some wood chips and BOOM...you have a great meal. clean-up is a snap. And to make it easier I ordered a remote timer/heat probe from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!  What a Bargain too!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a second "oven" to cook my Thanksgiving turkey but this turned out to not only be a Dutch-Oven but a Smoker also. Our turkey was a lovely golden brown and juicy. It was cooked to perfection in just a couple of hours and our house-full of our family enjoyed every bite. I need to cook another just to make my yearly Turkey Pot Pies! I can hardly wait to smoke different meats and even bake in it!
customer_reviews.author: Chambergal

customer_reviews.title: Love this roaster
customer_reviews.text: I love smoked turkey and this roaster did a great job. Next time I will only fill the Chip inserts half full instead of completely full. it started smoking after about 10 minutes and smoke lasted for 2 hours. Cooked at 325 degrees for 2 hours and 15 minutes,14 pound turkey. Breast meat pretty dry but had that Smoky flavor. Soot build-up under lid and under the insert pan was a real challenge to clean but overall much easier then using a backyard grill.
customer_reviews.author: goggypup

customer_reviews.title: Great value smoker
customer_reviews.text: Easy, no fuss, smoker. Made ribs in 3 hrs. It didn't get too hot on the outside. Used a rib rack inside. Hope to find some stackable racks for shortribs/turkey breasts/salmon and will try to use a wing/leg rack and a double beer can chicken rack. Very excited to smoke!
customer_reviews.author: StevenD925

customer_reviews.title: Great little smoker
customer_reviews.text: I know this is not really a real smoker, but is has worked out for me quite well. I have been quite impressed with usin this to smoke pork shoulders or briskets. I usually keep a close eye on the temperature.
customer_reviews.author: DoctorMasterBlaster

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!!! Smoked a beef brisket!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg!! I have been looking for something not as bulky that smokes food.. found this product and decided to try it. It absolutely works wonderfully.. would recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: pat

customer_reviews.title: The Cord is less than 1 foot long - how am I supposed to plug this into a socket?????
customer_reviews.text: The Cord is less than 1 foot long - how am I supposed to plug this into a socket????? I am not able to attempt to use this because the cord is too short!
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: best ever
customer_reviews.text: Love the smoker roaster. We smoked thanksgiving turkey. It was perfect. We put it in the garage with garage doors open, prepped my turkey by brining x 24hrs, applied seasoned butter, poured a couple of cups of broth in pan. Used the 2 side comparts for wood chips, set to 350, put thermometer in turkey. Checked it in 2 1/2 hrs and temp 170. Probably will do 2hr 10mins next time so it can come up to temp during the resting time. Tender, smoked turkey. I used pan drippings & bones for broth or extra seasoning for soups....Oh my gosh, my standard recipes 10x better with that little hint of smoke.
customer_reviews.author: M. Standish

customer_reviews.title: Truly the best I have ever made at home
customer_reviews.text: We are thrilled with this product! We bought it to make a turkey for Thanksgiving but decided to try it out first with pork chops. Truly the best I have ever made at home! We smoked them and the meat was moist with an incredible flavor. It only took maybe 30 minutes and they were done. Clean up was super simple and there was basically no prep at all, just at water and the wood chips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: Quite simply...we love it. Cooked a massive 20lb turkey on Thanksgiving with Apple wood chips and it came out excellent. Then I put eight chicken thighs in it with Apple wood chips and a couple cups of water and could not believe how awesome they came out. For $60, this is hard to beat. Warms up super quick and maintains the temperature in a very even, predictable manner. Cleanup was easy enough after soaking in soapy water overnight. Honestly, no complaints. I'm a noob smoker and I'm loving this! Buy with confidence!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Grimes

customer_reviews.title: It’s pretty big!
customer_reviews.text: Holes for smoking need to be a little higher up to allow for more liquid in cooking pan. Rack is a very amazing addition as it’s shapped to fit the pan. The handles on the rack make taking things out very simple and without making a mess. Power cord is way too short.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great Smoker
customer_reviews.text: I have not had another smoker to compare this to, but I will say it is easy to use and you do get the smoke taste you expect from it. Some meats have come out wetter then expected, so I have been finishing the food on a grill or in the regular oven. That could be from my own inexperience, but I don't think that would happen with a traditional smoker. I think that might be a trade-off; you get something very easy to use, but you miss the crispness and finish other products might give you.
customer_reviews.author: kyle wiles

customer_reviews.title: Great appliance
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about how this would work for me, but my family loves everything I've smoked in it so far....two whole chickens at the same time, a 3# brisket with a side of smoked vegetables. It puts out a bit of smoke, be sure it's outside. I haven't used it yet as an electric roaster, but anticipate great meals that way, too.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Norris

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: I returned it...it arrived day before Thanksgiving crushed on one corner. As a result I was unable to cook my 12 pound turkey on Thanksgiving day....I ran out trying to figure out what to do and ended up buying a 3 lb turkey breast so my friend ad I still had a turkey dinner. This was really a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa

customer_reviews.title: It's a really good and fast smoker
customer_reviews.text: It's a really good and fast smoker, but the only qualm I have with it is the really short cord. If you have a small kitchen or the electrical outlets are poorly spaced, you might want to reconsider purchasing this item.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Love the results, would make some edits. All in all glad I have it!
customer_reviews.text: I like this little smoker far more than I thought I would because it is so easy to use and provides nice results. I’m beyond frustrated by the incredibly short cord and I wish it came with a sheet pan that fit inside since it is an uncommon size. That said, I really like the resulting food, ease of cleaning and the friendly price!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine J.

customer_reviews.title: Love this roaster for the smoker!
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely satisfied with this purchase! I was comtplating a roaster purchase for Easter and other holiday cooking for family and I found this one with the smoker feature. It was the smoking feature that prompted me to purchase and I can say that I am beyond pleased with it. I have smoked turkey, salmon, chicken, pork roasts and ribs. All meats smoked have been amazing. My dad has an expensive electric smoker that has shelves, and he cannot believe how well and deliciously meats are smoked in this roaster using so little wood chips. If you do choose this roaster, it will cook faster than given cooking times in the instructional manual and the cord is very short.
customer_reviews.author: amy neal

customer_reviews.title: Great little smoker
customer_reviews.text: I cook with this in my garage. It does produce enoff smoke from the wood chips that I would never use in my home. So far I have smoked a rack of ribs, pork butt, and chiclen--- this thing will hold two full size chickens and does a wonderful job I highly recommend this product That said it does not replace a full size smoker, but for those one item type of meals it works great. When Icooked the rack of baby back ribes it barley fit. Size is the only real issue for me
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hundertmark

customer_reviews.title: Temp not accurate.
customer_reviews.text: I would love to love this product! I have used it 10 times and I love everything but the temp control must be broken. I over cook everything. I lower the temp every time. I just cooked a large tri tip in 35 minutes to a temp of 170 while the smoker was set to 175. I wanted a 130 temp. I lower the temp every time but it still cooks too fast. If it worked properly it would be 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This has become our favorite kitchen appliance. We have used it to cook and smoke so many things! If I had one complaint, it’s that when you take the lid off, be careful where you set it, because you’ll have a black greasy rectangular mark where you set it. Which is a problem if you have granite countertops.
customer_reviews.author: C. Klemetsen

customer_reviews.title: Don't exceed chip instructions :)
customer_reviews.text: I filled both wood chippers to max against mfg recommendations. I think i smoked out entire neighborhood. Pork picnic was great, just a little too much smoke on rear patio. Love this roaster.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna M.

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: OmGosh! I love it!! I was most excited that it could roast & smoke. My first attempt was to smoke a small Turkey breast, smelled wonderful while it was smoking outside. I was apprehensive, prepared for a "Plan B" dinner, but it turned out juicy & wonderful! I did have to McGyver the cook time a little bit, as the little recipe/manual that came with it only gave a few examples of weights for baking/roasting/smoking. Very easy to clean. Now, if I can only find a nice spot to store it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Nice smoker and slow cooker
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, the only thing I think could be approved on are the instructions on how to use and the recipe detail. However, I've been able to leverage the Amazon feedback to fill in the missing instructions. Roasted oysters and added smoking chips, in 5 minutes I felt like I was back home at a oyster roast, Oysters where plump with a hint of smoke.
customer_reviews.author: TAZ

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great size and great smoker
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to smoke for our Thanksgiving Turkey. I didn't want another large item on the porch year round and this fits neatly on a shelf in the garage and cleans easily. Everybody loved the Turkey and the smokey flavor. I think it's the best Turkey I've ever had. We also cooked ribs when we first got this that was also very good. If you want a smoker and don't have a ton of outdoor space then this is a perfect fit!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a champ. We smoked a 12 pound turkey for Christmas and it turned out great. We’ve also cook chicken wings, salmon, shrimp, and corn on the cob. So far (only had for a month) it works great and everything taste wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Good as advertised...
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for smoking meat. My only complaint would be, one pocket doesn't get hot enough to burn the wood chips as the other pocket does. However, one pocket still provides plenty of smoke flavor. We've bought 5 and gave them as gifts which everyone likes...
customer_reviews.author: Don Heddinger

customer_reviews.title: Okay appliance, but not good for low-temp smoking.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item thinking it would work for smoking at low temperatures prior to roasting, but once it arrived I realized this wasn't possible. The instructions point that the unit is not appropriate for low-temp smoking, but the online product description doesn't. This would probably make a perfectly adequate roaster for those who aren't too concerned with the limitations of the smoking function, but for my particular needs it was next to useless, so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Don Z.

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with this Roaster Oven!
customer_reviews.text: For those that like to smoke their meats but don't care for the huge smoker (or just looking for convenience), this is a great alternative. I have had mine for several years now and use it often to smoke meats. Of course you need to use it outside (I place mine in the garage and open the door), but it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer - MI

customer_reviews.title: Roaster/Smoker comments
customer_reviews.text: In Texas, it can be a pain to cook indoors during the summer in an oven, its too hot. That is precisely why I bought this roaster . It smokes, it roasts, it slow cooks, I just plug it up outside! I am about to use it now, and its July, At 1st used the smoke trays and it only smoked once at 400° once. I was kinda bummed after I added wood chips a 2nd time and it did NOT smoke. However, the 2nd ,and 3rd time it did!! It smoked wonderfully, I suppose it was operator error on the 1st run. Enjoy it, buy it!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Practical
customer_reviews.text: Great unit. Smokes and bakes very well. Better suited to smoking smaller amounts of meat that most people would actually be able to use. Manual is useless, so it takes a bit of experimenting to get things right, but the results are more than worth it. I've found that setting the temperature control at 200 degrees and using a meat thermometer is the best way to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Stanwyck

customer_reviews.title: Best appliance I’ve ever bought!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to smoke foods, roast and bake. Very versatile, will be buying another to keep in our camper. Easy to clean and lightweight too.
customer_reviews.author: D. Spaide

customer_reviews.title: It's so easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Anyone can use this. There's practically no set up, it's ready to go and the smoked flavor is wonderful. The only thing I found was that the cook time was much less than stipulated so I will be experimenting some more.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Halstead

customer_reviews.title: Thanksgiving done right
customer_reviews.text: Best turkey I ever made! This cooker really does roast to perfection. You will not be sorry
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Very very short cord
customer_reviews.text: I havent used the roaster yet but the manufacturer was very stingy with the cord. Its about 12 inches long. Come on put a longer cord on it. I am hoping that the smoker works well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Forget engagement chicken and smoke that man some ribs!!!
customer_reviews.text: The easiest smoker I've ever used in my life. Uses minimal wood chips, no long complicated process or directions, and perfect food every time. I used it on 3 slabs of baby back ribs (took the rack out) and they were a little slice of heaven. I wouldn't use it as a smoker indoors though bless you have a fan and a window. Great for smoking/steaming fish as well. My snapper is always perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Prime Junky

customer_reviews.title: Better than regular smoker
customer_reviews.text: This is better than any smoker I've tried. Meat comes out perfect every time and theres no hassle trying to regulate the temp. This is a game changer...I've tried pulled pork and brisket and they both turned out amazing!
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: I love it, I have smoked almost everything in mines
customer_reviews.author: LAKEISHA SANDERS

customer_reviews.title: LoVE It!
customer_reviews.text: LoVE It!!!! We have smoked turkey and chickens. It cooks fast and leaves a nice smokey flavor. We used cherry chips with our poultry. Yumm!!
customer_reviews.author: Shawnae

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this smoker roaster oven
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this smoker roaster oven. So far, I have smoked/roasted whole chickens, ribs, an 8 lb brisket and our Thanksgiving turkey. My family says they only want smoked turkey for Thanksgiving from now on. The gravy that I made from the chicken and turkey drippings was the best I've ever tasted. Very easy to clean up. It takes up a lot of storage room, but it's worth having.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT little roaster/smoker, especially for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a year now, and absolutely love it. Great quality roaster with a smoking option, for a great price. Amazing deal! It's currently doing a whole pork loin quite easily fit: has also done small turkeys and numerous chickens. Very happy. You do need an extension cord to run it outside, but hey.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: Hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t really cook a lot of meat. And unless you have a very large sink to wash very large pots you are out of luck. As a meat smoker it is puny. I threw it away. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: T. Drymon

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker
customer_reviews.text: This is an outstanding smoker. Easy to use easy to clean. Without a meat thermometer it's kinda trial and error as to how long to smoke a particular meat. The second time I used mine, the meat wasn't quite done. No problem, I just turned it up to the broil temp and in a short time the meat was great and had a great smoked flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Carl H.

customer_reviews.title: NOT a smoker
customer_reviews.text: This appliance is fine for roasting meat, but it does not create the smoked taste that I am looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Katz

customer_reviews.title: Overall very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: First time cooking with a smoker and it was super easy. Did a 13.5 lb turkey, set it at 225 and was done in 3hrs. Everyone said it was great and very moist. It was done a lot sooner then i expected, but i checked the temps and it said it was done. I did brine it overnight like other reviewers suggested. The only thing that I'm still unsure about is the vent. When do u open it? Close it? Keep it semi open? Doesn't really mention it in the instructions. I guess trial and error on that part.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: temperature control failed
customer_reviews.text: the roaster worked quite well at first. Recently the temperature began fluctuating wildly. At a set temp of 300 it started at 370, never reached 300 and went up and down until after about 3 hours settled to fluctuating between 335 land 345 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I have so far cooked a 18 pound turkey, and others meats all where done faster than an over and moist and very flavor full. Clean up easy and fast.
customer_reviews.author: dotbear

customer_reviews.title: Big Family Size multi oven
customer_reviews.text: Cooks fast, real smoke taste through your food, Clean up is very easy. power cord is very short. Its a big oven so make room. Gets relay hot
customer_reviews.author: Treymarqus

customer_reviews.title: Cooks fast with great flavor to
customer_reviews.text: It creates a great Smokey flavor but it’s hard to slow cook in it like with a brisket. I think the consistency of the heat actually works against you when you’re wanting to do a slow smoke recipe. Say I’d normally smoke a brisket at about 230-250 Degrees with charcoal and wood chips, on this I’d need to turn it down to 150 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Used it on chicken and a Turkey. Both were moist and the flavor of the smoke throughout was fantastic. YES, I really don't care for the short cord but ordering the 3ft cord made the problem an afterthought . Its convenient, easy to clean, compact and stores away very well. Bravo!
customer_reviews.author: maria williams

customer_reviews.title: Great cooker/ smoker, Short cord.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Cooks perfect. Almost better than an oven. Can’t wait to cook so much more in it. One con is the power cord is so short. Won’t even reach receptacle on counter top. Needed to be at least 8” longer but should of been two foot overall. Pretty odd for a cooker. Have to stack it up to reach.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Spohn

customer_reviews.title: It gives good smokey flavor
customer_reviews.text: It lived up to my expectation . It gives good smokey flavor. Easy to clean. The cook book instructions could be better to include the temperature setting and approximate time needed for the different kind of meats
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than a second oven!
customer_reviews.text: We have one oven and friends brought over a turkey in their toaster slightly larger than this one. We love it and bought one for us. Much cheaper than a second oven. Red is very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Paul E Nation

customer_reviews.title: Great thing
customer_reviews.text: I’ve given two as gifts I like mine so much
customer_reviews.author: Steven Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase All Year!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! Bought it for my husband. Thought he would not like it, because he's such a die hard charcoal guy, but he is loving this for his ribs...they are beautiful. Smoke flavor is excellent! Do not attempt to use inside....he attaches to heavy extension cord and just sets it on top of the grill. So happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: G. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Package damaged
customer_reviews.text: I got the use one. It says that it will come with the box damaged but the product was also damaged pretty badly. But besides all that it works great. I smoke a turkey and it cooked early than expected. I love but wish I had just order a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Perez

customer_reviews.title: Use outside
customer_reviews.text: Good product. My big problem is, you can’t see inside when it’s cooking. And you don’t want to lift the lid and let all of the heat out. It’s a little quicker cooking than the directions state, for turkey.
customer_reviews.author: Dean A. Hostetter

customer_reviews.title: New Roaster came Damaged
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an event and took this product out of the box and looked fine at first. I set it aside and threw out the packaging. When I went to use the roaster and wash the insert I noticed the product was damaged (photos attached) It looks as if the Enamel-Coating was not applied properly on the bottom of the pan. It has a huge hole exposing the metal. It also had some damage to the enamel on the smoker inserts.
customer_reviews.author: michael e matters

customer_reviews.title: Great salmon smoker
customer_reviews.text: ·Smokes well, good flavor ·Doesn't go through chips too quickly ·Large capacity, just need to purchase additional racks to maximize the area ·Easy for first time smoker users ·Only downside is it is so large it is difficult to clean in a smaller/regular size kitchen sink ·A low maintenance smoke and fun thing to do! ·Would highly recommend! ·
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We love this toaster oven. We use the smoker part of it the most and couldn’t be happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really happy. The temp settings panted on the outside aren't ...
customer_reviews.text: Really happy. The temp settings panted on the outside aren't quite right, but this turned out some really tasty smoked turkey and chicken for Thanksgiving. I know someone else that bought the same thing and were both super happy. It makes smoking so easy!
customer_reviews.author: skaese

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used it for smoking as well as roasting works great for both. And looks great
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!! I love this
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!! I love this!! It works great and it gives food a great smoked flavor!! I would give it a ten star if I could. Perfect if your only going to smoke a small amounts. Like one Boston Butt!
customer_reviews.author: sandy holt1!

customer_reviews.title: Great controlled cook!
customer_reviews.text: Smoked 2 briskets for 1 1/2 hours then cooked at 225 for 3 hours made great fajitas for a party!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Fit a 18 pound with room to spare. Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: douglas

customer_reviews.title: Very portable
customer_reviews.text: Very portable. I smoked chicken leg quarters using mesquite habanero rub. At 300f for 2 hrs. They taste awesome. Next time I'll try smoke fish/salmon. The electrical cord is too short though.
customer_reviews.author: Joel D

customer_reviews.title: Great Smoker/roaster but damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Smoked turkey great but has a anal place the enamel is gone. I will be asking for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Smith

customer_reviews.title: This oven gets very hot and fast.  Cooks at a much faster rate than my indoor oven does.
customer_reviews.text: I have to watch so I don't overcook. I am still learning on it.
customer_reviews.author: SUSAN R GRANT

customer_reviews.title: SMOKED!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a smoking machine!!!!! I've smoked every day since I've had it. Just set the temp and let it go... Amazing results!!
customer_reviews.author: mark m

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a first time smoker user. This little thing is great, you throw in a handful of wood chips and your meat with some broth and walk away. A few hour later you have a kick ass smoked dinner. Clean up is not so great, but all grill/smokers are.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beginner smoker.
customer_reviews.text: A decent entry level appliance for smoking but temperature seems a bit off. Each smoking attempt ends up with better results. A better instruction manual or recipe book with hint and tips would improve this product.
customer_reviews.author: L. Schneider

customer_reviews.title: A true smoker
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this being a true smoker, but it really is. Just for my first trial I was in a hurry and put a solid frozen pork butt in and 4 hours later I had a perfectly tender smoked butt. It was fabulous without even using a rub.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Patrick

customer_reviews.title: The Best Smoker for a Beginner!
customer_reviews.text: I love this oven! I have used it as a smoker for fish, brisket, ribs and chicken. It is absolutely wonderful! As a beginner to smoking meats I did not want to buy some big item first thing. This smoker is perfect and does a wonderful job!
customer_reviews.author: Azhlynne

customer_reviews.title: Economical.
customer_reviews.text: It is very light weight, easy to clean except the lid which discolored after first use. Did not like the short cord.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Smokes seafood as well as meat very well. Easy to use, process releases very little smoke into the air. Cleans up after use very easily too.
customer_reviews.author: Roibeard

customer_reviews.title: Sigh...
customer_reviews.text: Love the product, BUT it came without the WOOD CHIP INSERT. This might've been a repackaged return. Rather than go though a return or exchange process. I went over to the Oster website and bought the missing wood chip inserts for $5.99. Sometimes you have to pave your own roads.
customer_reviews.author: M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and works well
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe how easy it is to smoke in this!!! Set it and forget it. And everything turns out amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Kirsiaulin

customer_reviews.title: any  good  hints  on  clean  up?
customer_reviews.text: Got it Friday. I smoked 2 whole chickens It had a good smoke flavor and moist can't wait to do a Turkey or BRISKET Glad I got it. just wondering for those who already have one any good hints For cleaning the smoker? Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Roaster-smoker
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these and use it quite often. My son likes to cook for pot lucks at his work. When he tasted the ham I smoked for Christmas, he was very impressed to say the least. He was thrilled when he opened the present, smoker-roaster of his own.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Very Good!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for the price, and works very well. Setup and operation is a breeze. Like other reviewers, I think the cord is a bit short, but not a deal breaker. Easily remedied with a quality extension cord. Will buy a second one..
customer_reviews.author: W. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Love this roaster
customer_reviews.text: I love this roaster. I’ve only had it for a month but so far it’s been great. Cooked a whole turkey over Christmas and it came out so moist and perfect. I’ve also cooked pork tenderloin and lamb. Both also perfectly cooked.
customer_reviews.author: fikirte maraghy

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: worked well for smoked salmon, meats. still trying different recipes
customer_reviews.author: khalbon

customer_reviews.title: Temperature is too hot
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for smoking. I put a marinated brisket with wood chips in at 225. At an hour it had reached 176 degrees. And meat tough. I also smoked salmon, but only left it 30 minutes. Good but dry. Even with water in the pan. So there is no low-temperature smoking.
customer_reviews.author: K. DELAVEGA

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product! Easy to use, clean, and food is phenomenal. Truly going to be a workhorse in this household as we love to smoke meats and fish and don’t want to lose an entire day to have dinner. First meal was salmon and it was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Dirk Comstock

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money. Made the holiday cooking so much easier. I can't wait to try the smoker feature.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Bee

product_meta.title: Oster Smoker Roaster Oven, 16-Quart, Red Smoke (CKSTROSMK18)
product_meta.description: From the 1 brand in roasters and five star consumer rated, the large, 16-quart capacity Oster Smoker-Roaster Oven provides 2-way flexibility to prepare and serve delicious holiday turkey, ham, ribs and more You can steam-roast tender, flavorful meals in the kitchen or kick up the flavor with outdoor smoking! The key to delicious smoked flavor is the combination of wood chips, low temperatures, steam and long cook time, which is just how this smoker is designed to cook. Use in the kitchen as a roaster to prepare traditional holiday turkey roasts for everyone around the table to enjoy. You can serve special occasion dinners with confidence knowing this roaster cooks meats perfectly, with moist, juicy, tender texture and flavor. Not only that, you'll save 30% more time for cooking and use 36% less energy than a traditional oven.ᶧ Versatile to do more, this countertop oven also bakes and slow cooks as well, to prepare a variety of different foods, from the first course to dessert
feature_bullets: Electric roaster oven can be used as a smoker, roaster, or slow cooker
The 16-quart roaster holds up to a 20-pound turkey
Adjustable temperature control from 150 to 450 degrees F
Removable pockets hold wood chips for outdoor smoking
Enamel-coated steel roasting pan and rack are removable for easy cleaning

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars691 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
